subject: SF6047238967882
description_text:
Hi,

 Has this been shipped? The tracking number is not bringing anything up...

Thanks

Dave

conversations.body_text: Hi David Aldersey,  Due to product upgrades, this item has been out of stock for two weeks. Once the upgrades are complete, we will ship the latest version to you as soon as possible to enhance your experience. We expect to ship within the next few days. We sincerely apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused.

Hi it's okay,

 Could you amend the total value to Below 135 on the invoice? Or send them
in separate shipments so that I don't go above the Vat threshold in the UK?

Thanks

Dave
Hi David Aldersey,  â€‹Yes, there will be no value-added tax charged. You don't need to worry.

Ok, I thought the Threshold was 135 in the UK?

Dave
